Headline: No trains between Loop and 18th
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Loop and 18th due to debris on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Loop and 18th due to debris on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between 18th and 54th/Cermak at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Pulaski-Pink and 18th to provide connecting service.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
